body.p: The KDE e.V. and FSFE office in Berlin invites you to their office BBQ and KDE 4.5 release party from 17.30 on Friday 27 August in the Linienstr. 141. The office is in the backyard.
We will take care of the drinks, the bread, salad and the grill. Please bring yourself and your prefered food!
If you plan to attend, let us know before 20 August.
